overview:
David oversees the company’s legal affairs, and provides business and legal guidance to his colleagues.

He brings a strong and diverse legal background to the company: previously serving as a legal and business executive at DIC Entertainment, a global brand management and children’s entertainment company, and LRN, a top provider of ethics and compliance management solutions. Before that, he worked as a corporate attorney at Wilson, Sonsini, Goodrich & Rosati in Palo Alto, CA and as a Manhattan prosecutor. He received a B.A. from Brandeis University; an M.A. in Public Policy from the Eagleton Institute of Politics; and a J.D., with honors, from Harvard Law School. David also co-founded Law School Podcaster (www.lawschoolpodcaster.com), a popular producer/distributor of podcasts and other content for pre-law and law students.

David loves to play games and do puzzles with his daughters, and to hike in Hollywood’s Runyon Canyon with his dog, Holly. On the golf circuit, he may be the only 28 handicap in Southern California who can boast two holes-in-one.
